title: Mediterranean Quiche
subtitle: Emeril Lagasse
description: A savory veggie-filled quiche with Gruyère, goat cheese, and Mediterranean flavors.
steps: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat. Add onions and zucchini; cook 6 minutes.
Add mushrooms; cook until liquid evaporates and vegetables wilt, about 10 minutes.
Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, basil, thyme, salt and pepper; cook 1 minute. Remove from heat and cool.
In a bowl, beat eggs and half‑and‑half together. Stir in salt, pepper, Gruyère, and crushed red pepper.
Place vegetable mix into the prepared pie crust, pour egg mixture on top, and crumble goat cheese evenly.
Bake 25–30 minutes until set. Cool 30 minutes before serving.
notes: Be sure to drain the vegetables well before filling to prevent a soggy crust. Best served after a 30 min rest.
